content: New chat started. Choose any Repo. I will help you analyzing, optimizing or querying the data you provide me.

The provided commit history does not include the first commit details. To determine the first commit, you would typically need access to the complete commit history of the repository, including the earliest commits. However, based on what's shared here, the oldest entry appears to be from July 8, 2024, attributed to Alonso Guevara with the message "Add issue templates (#448)".

If you need to find the definitive first commit, consider using Git commands such as `git log --reverse` to get the commit history from the beginning or `git rev-list --max-parents=0 HEAD` to see the very first commit in the repository.
